CustomField.description: Free text field for users to add some comments about the account which may provide additional context, branding and/or local account details, as well as historical background. This field is non-reportable and is subject to being overwritten by other users.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This non-reportable field is intended to offer users with the ability to type in notes to add some comments about the account which may provide additional context, branding and/or local account details, as well as historical background. This field is subject to being overwritten by other users.
CustomField.label: Account Notes
